question.text: Read the given statements and select the CORRECT one.

options.text: DNA is preferred genetic material over proteins because amino acids in proteins cannot be       arranged variously to form long chains.
In microsatellite DNA, repetitive nucleotide sequence of 10-15 bp units are flanked by restriction sites.
RNA renaturation after melting is slow than DNA renaturation
Noncoding DNA sequences code for tRNA and rRNA.

solution.text: Part of DNA sequence which does not code for any protein is called non-coding DNA. It corresponds to almost 98% of total human genomic DNA. Non coding DNA comprises of introns, intergenic DNA. They also act as regulatory elements in form of Promoters, Enahncer, Silencers, etc. However, some non coding DNA can be transcribed into transfer RNA, ribosomal RNA as well as regulatory RNA.
